name: get_agent
description: Get a specific agent configuration by ID or slug. Searches both space-specific and global locations with hierarchical fallback (space → global). Returns the agent configuration with source information.

agent_id.description: Agent ID (e.g., 'budget_tracker'). Will search all domains if slug not provided.

slug.description: Agent slug in format domain:agent_id (e.g., 'finance:budget_tracker'). Takes precedence over agent_id.

target_space.description: Optional: Target a specific named space (e.g., 'creative', 'education'). Defaults to current space.

search_global.description: Whether to search in global data as fallback (default: true)

search_space.description: Whether to search in space-specific data first (default: true)
